name: Galagaio
description:
GALAGAIO

Objective of the Game :

Hey, I finally decided to put us(me and my dad) game on itch.io, it's a game in which you lead a ship and your goal is to destroy the enemy ships to claim gold and some other reward(will come later).

When you destroy ships they have a small chance to drop a bonus that will increase your bullet amount.

Future update :

I will put a new devlog on the game every 2 weeks.

Now, my goal is to rework and redo the whole UI of the game + Fix bugs + add bonuses.

Notify me :

As the game is in the beginning of development, don't hesitate to warn me about bugs or to make suggestions for the game!
